Consciousness.short_description: Fundamental faculty of awareness and being aware of being aware.

Intelligence.short_description: Faculty of understanding, comprehension, and knowledge-formation.

Will.short_description: Faculty of intention, choice, and directed action.

Intuition.short_description: Faculty of direct knowing without rational intermediation.

Reason.short_description: Faculty of logical analysis and conceptual understanding.

Perception.short_description: Faculty of receiving and interpreting impressions of reality.

Memory.short_description: Faculty of retaining and accessing past experiences and knowledge.

Imagination.short_description: Faculty of forming and manipulating mental images and possibilities.

Affect.short_description: Faculty of feeling, emotion, and qualitative experience.

Recognition.short_description: Faculty of identifying patterns and meaning in experience.

Attention.short_description: Faculty of focused awareness and selective consciousness.

Witness.short_description: Faculty of pure observation without involvement.

Volition.short_description: Faculty of initiating and directing action and change.

Discrimination.short_description: Faculty of distinguishing between different qualities and truths.

Integration.short_description: Faculty of synthesizing multiple elements into coherent wholes.

Expression.short_description: Faculty of manifesting inner content in outer form.

Reception.short_description: Faculty of taking in and absorbing influences and information.

Contemplation.short_description: Faculty of sustained attention on essence of things.

Intuitive Mind.short_description: Faculty of direct insight into truth and reality.

Higher Mind.short_description: Faculty of abstract and universal thought.

Vital.short_description: Faculty of life force, energy, and dynamism.

Psychic.short_description: Faculty of soul-based knowing and being.

Heart.short_description: Faculty of connection, love, and value-sensing.

Body Consciousness.short_description: Faculty of physical awareness and material intelligence.

Spirit.short_description: Faculty of pure being and essential nature.

Presence.short_description: Faculty of being fully in the present moment.

Gnosis.short_description: Faculty of direct spiritual knowledge and understanding.

Understanding.short_description: Faculty of comprehensive grasp of meaning and significance.

Wisdom.short_description: Faculty of deep insight into nature of reality and right action.

Creative Force.short_description: Faculty of bringing new forms and expressions into being.

Aspiration.short_description: Faculty of upward movement toward higher possibilities.

Faith.short_description: Faculty of conviction and trust in unseen realities.

Unity.short_description: Faculty of experiencing oneness and interconnection.

Transcendence.short_description: Faculty of rising above normal limitations of consciousness.

Being.short_description: Faculty of pure existence and essential nature.
